topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Algorithms :: Genetic Algorithms

name: PGAPy
short_description: pgapack, the parallel genetic algorithm library is a powerfull genetic algorithm library by D. Levine, Mathematics and Computer Science Division Argonne National Laboratory. The library is written in C. PGAPy wraps this library for use with Python.
